Sentencas: Doped strontium titanates have been widely studied as potential anode materials in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The high n-type conductivity that can be achieved in these materials makes them well suited for use as the electronically conductive component in SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: This makes them a potential alternative to nickel, the presence of which can be a major cause of degradation due to coking, sulfur poisoning and low tolerance to redox cycling.
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Here anode performance results are presented for an A-site deficient strontium titanate co-doped with lanthanum and calcium on the perovskite A-site, La0.20Sr0.25Ca0.45TiO3 (LSCTA-).
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: LSCTA- anodes and LSM cathodes were screen printed on 160 mu m thick 6-ScSZ electrolyte supports.
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The LSCTA- anode backbone showed poor electrode performance, but its conductivity was sufficient to keep ohmic losses low.
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Upon impregnation with combinations of ceria and nickel, ohmic losses and polarization impedances are significantly reduced, resulting in a drastic improvement in anode performance.
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Unexpectedly, the performance of cells impregnated with both ceria and nickel showed an improvement upon redox cycling.
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: A stable area specific resistance of 0.37 Omega cm(2) was achieved after 20 redox cycles and 250 hours of operation at 900 degrees C in H-2 with 8% H2O, showing excellent redox stability.
Titulo: Evaluation of Ca Doped La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 as an Alternative Material for Use in SOFC Anodes
